content: सम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Same, identical. {@--2@} Equal, as in समलोष्टकांचनः <ls>R. 8. 21</ls>; <ls>Pt. 2. 7</ls>; <ls>Bg. 2. 38.</ls> {@--3@} Like, similar, resembling; with <ab>instr.</ab> or <ab>gen.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>; गुणयुक्तो दरिद्रोपि नेश्वरैरगुणैः समः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 13.</ls> {@--4@} Even, level, plain; समदेशवर्तिनस्ते न दुरासदो भविष्यति <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Even (as number). {@--6@} Impartial, fair. {@--7@} Just, honest, upright. {@--8@} Good, virtuous. {@--9@} Ordinary, common. {@--10@} Mean, middling. {@--11@} Straight. {@--12@} Suitable, convenient. {@--13@} Indifferent, unmoved, unaffected by passion. {@--14@} All, every one. {@--15@} All, whole, entire, complete. --मः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of certain zodiacal signs (वृष, कर्कट, कन्या, वृश्चिक, मकर, and मीन). {@--2@} A mode of measuring time in music. --मं {@--1@} A level plain, flat country; <ls>Ki. 9. 11.</ls> {@--2@} (In rhet.) <ab>N.</ab> of a figure of speech. {@--3@} (In geometry) A mean proportional segment. --मं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} With, together with, in company with, accompanied by; (with <ab>instr.</ab>); आहो निवत्स्यति समं हरिणांगनाभिः <ls>Ś. 1. 27</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 25</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 63</ls>, <ls n="R.">16. 72.</ls> {@--2@} Equally; यथा सर्वाणि भूतानि धरा धारयते समं <ls>Ms. 9. 311.</ls> {@--3@} Like, similarly, in the same manner; <ls>Pt. 1. 78.</ls> {@--4@} Entirely. {@--5@} Simultaneously, all at once, at the same time, together; नंव पयो यत्र घनैर्मया च त्वद्विप्रयोगाश्रु समं विसृष्टं <ls>R. 13. 26.</ls> <ls n="R.">4. 4</ls>; <ls n="R.">10. 59</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 1.</ls>
